Conversation: One-third of $CSCO's revenues now come from software sales and, of its total revenue, 50% is annual recurring. So CSCO of today is not the same as that of Y2K. The change has been slow but it's there to see in the revenue streams.CSCO has partnered nVidia and is likely to make a substantial investment in nVidia backed CoreWeave. The article here explains the details better than I can.  www.techzine.eu/...I bought some CSCO stock 5 years ago and I remain a disappointed investor in it. While the market has zoomed up based on upward moving valuation multiples, CSCO's valuation remains in the unloved sub 15X territory based on earning. CSCO has to find a way to make the market fall in love with it again. It has not done so yet.
